title: Course Features
text: This course offers is designed wisely by including basic to advance Topics, Quizzes, Assignments, and couple of real world Projects. You will also get a certificate of completion after completing the course.

section.title: Topics
section.content: It includes basics to advanced topics like React Components, Props, Redux, Styling, React Router, API Integration, Hooks and much more.

section.title: 3+ Quizzes
section.content: Quizzes are designed to help you test your knowledge and understanding of the course. You will get a quiz after each section.

section.title: 6+ Projects
section.content: Projects are designed to help you practice the concepts you have learned in the course. You will get a project after each section.

section.title: Certificate
section.content: You will get a certificate of completion after completing the course.
